```{r include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(tmap)

tmap_mode("view")

# Load and extract ----
epaWa <- st_read("../../static/files/gis/us_eco_l4_state_boundaries/us_eco_l4.shp") %>% 
  filter(STATE_NAME == "Washington") %>% 
  select(US_L4CODE, US_L4NAME, US_L3NAME)
```

# Visited Ecoregions

```{r, out.width = '100%'}
visits <- read_csv("../../static/files/database/ecoregion-visits.csv")

epaWaVisited <- epaWa %>% 
  filter(US_L4CODE %in% visits$US_L4CODE) %>% 
  full_join(visits)

tm_shape(epaWa) +
  tm_polygons(alpha = 0) +
  tm_shape(epaWaVisited) +
  tm_polygons(col = "forestgreen", alpha = 0.6) +
  tm_basemap("https://server.arcgisonline.com/ArcGIS/rest/services/World_Topo_Map/MapServer/tile/{z}/{y}/{x}")
```
